contents.text: Welcome to Vero, where engineering, product, and marketing teams craft data-driven communications for personalized customer experiences.
Press 1 for sales and product inquiries.
Press 1 for a personalized product demo.
Please hold while we connect you with a product specialist.

navigationGoals: I need a personalized demo to see how Vero can streamline our customer messaging workflows.
I'd like a product demo focused on veteran outreach use cases.
I’d like a live demo of Vero’s API-driven personalization and segmentation features.
I’d like someone to show me how Vero works with a live walkthrough of its main features.
I’d like a live walkthrough of Vero’s personalized messaging features to see if they fit my lab’s data communication needs.

contents.text: Press 2 to learn about pricing and plans.
Please hold while we connect you to our sales team to discuss pricing.

navigationGoals: I want to review Vero’s pricing tiers and plans to decide on the best subscription for my team.
Get pricing details and plan options for a small veterans nonprofit.
I need a detailed breakdown of pricing tiers, usage limits, and overage costs for high-volume email sends.
I want to speak with someone about your subscription plans and find out which one fits my needs.
Could you explain Vero’s pricing tiers and plans? I’m budgeting for my student research group.

contents.text: Press 1 for integration and setup assistance.
Please hold while we connect you with our integration support staff.

navigationGoals: I need help integrating Vero with our current CRM so we can start sending campaigns today.
Help me set up and integrate Vero with our veteran support CRM.
Assist me with integrating the Vero JavaScript SDK into my React application.
I need assistance connecting Vero to my website and setting up my first campaign.
I need assistance integrating Vero’s API with our existing experiment data pipeline.

contents.text: Press 2 to report a bug or incident.
Please hold while we connect you to our support engineers to address your issue.

navigationGoals: I need to report a bug that’s preventing our automated emails from sending correctly.
Report a bug: some automated emails aren’t sending to contacts.
I’m experiencing intermittent 500 errors on the transactional email API endpoint and need to report the incident.
I need to report a problem I encountered when trying to send an email through Vero.
I encountered a bug with event triggers not firing when new experiment logs upload and need to report it.
